article_title: Beshear reauthorizes health care exchange, again sidestepping state lawmakers
article_text: Gov. Steve Beshear filed an executive order Monday authorizing the continued implementation of the federal health care law in Kentucky, again sidestepping state lawmakers who have blasted Beshear for moving forward without their approval.

article_metadata.title: Beshear reauthorizes health care exchange, again sidestepping state lawmakers | Lexington Herald-Leader
